subject: NO UPFRONT PAYMENT NEEDED,
body:
NO UPFRONT PAYMENT NEEDED,
No upfront money needed from you and your payment is ready
Dear Sir,
Sir,
RE: GOOD NEWS AS YOU WILL RECEIVE YOUR FUNDS THIS FINAL QUARTER OF THE FISCAL YEAR 2023.I write to inform you that your name is among the beneficiaries that will receive their funds of US$10.5 Million (Ten Million Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars Only) this second quarter of the fiscal year 2023.
In view of this good news, I am pleased to inform you that your total Payment Compensation Entitlement of US$10.5 Million has been cleared and approved to be released to you finally through our Offshore Payment Centers in two different countries which will be disclosed to you as soon as you respond to my proposal. Consequently, you are expected to travel to two countries of offshore payment centers to sign your Original Funds Classified Document (OFCD) to legally empower our Payment Officer to transfer your funds to you without you paying any money upfront again till your funds get into your bank account of your choice.
PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU ARE NOT GOING TO ADVANCE OR PAY ANY MONEY UPFRONT TILL YOUR FUNDS GET TO YOUR BANK ACCOUNT Furthermore, it is very important that you send me the below information as to enable us get your Flight Ticket and your Hotel Accommodation, note that all the expenses to the trip will be taken care of by the bank.
1) Your full name
2) Your address
3) Your telephone number
4} Your Picture
5] Age
6] Occupation
7] Your Mobile Tel. No./Whatsapp Tel. No.
8]Valid Copy of Your International Passport.
9] Name of Your Nearest International Airport in Your City.
Finally, if you accept to make the trip, note that the entire journey will take you only 5 days to conclude. Therefore,you should prepare yourself for the number of days that you will travel.Kindly contact me on my private email address 
mssimabahous1@aol.com
Await your urgent reply.
Yours Faithfully
Ms Sima Bahous

subject: Re:   NO UPFRONT PAYMENT NEEDED,
body:
Dear Ms. Sima Bahous,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this exciting news. I must say, it sounds quite intriguing. I appreciate your assurance that no upfront payment is needed from my end. That definitely puts my mind at ease.

Before I proceed, could you please provide me with some more information? Firstly, which countries are the offshore payment centers located in? It would be helpful to know where I might need to travel.

Additionally, could you explain a bit more about the Original Funds Classified Document (OFCD)? What exactly does it entail and why is it necessary for me to sign it?

Lastly, if I decide to make the trip, what kind of accommodations can I expect? Will the bank be arranging everything for me?

I look forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Gerald

subject: Re: No fee needed from you, Kindly  prepare your mind for the trip.
body:
Mr. Gerald

This is to acknowledgethe receipt of your email.regrding your payment of $10.5M.

Sir, you are notrequired to send any fee to anyone or group of persons but you will be expectedto travel to sign your fund payment documents (Original Funds ClassifiedDocument (OFCD))

Kindly send to me you’refollowing personal details thus

1)     Your full name
2) Your address
3) Your telephone number
4} Your Picture
5] Age
6] Occupation
7] Your Mobile Tel. No./What Sapp Tel. No.
8]Valid Copy of Your International Passport.
9] Name of Your Nearest International Airport inYour City.

Sir, as soon as I receiveyour above personal details, I shall let you know the Countries to visit foryour signing and payment.
As per the arrangement,I will be linking you up to my protocol officer that will let you know otherprocedures of your trip.
Kindly view my attached working identity Card.
Waiting for yourprompt response.
Best Regards

MS Sima Bahous

subject: Re: No fee needed from you, Kindly  prepare your mind for the trip.
body:
Hello Mr. Gerald,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your prompt response and the information you have provided. However, before I proceed, I would like to clarify a few things.

Could you please explain in more detail why I need to travel to sign my fund payment documents? Is there a specific reason why this cannot be done remotely or through a trusted representative?

Additionally, I would like to know more about the countries I will be visiting for signing and payment purposes. Can you provide some information about these countries and their respective protocols?

Lastly, could you please explain the role of your protocol officer? What will their responsibilities be during my trip?

I look forward to your response and further guidance.

Best wishes,
Gerald

subject: Re: No fee needed from you, Kindly  prepare your mind for the trip.
body:
sir,
Send my requested information.
Thank you.

subject: Re: No fee needed from you, Kindly  prepare your mind for the trip.
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out. I'm sorry, but I'm not sure what you mean by "Send my requested." Could you please provide more information or clarify your request? I'll do my best to assist you.

Best wishes,
Gerald

subject: Re: No fee needed from you, Kindly  prepare your mind for the trip.
body: Send to me your personal details.Thank you

subject: Re: No fee needed from you, Kindly  prepare your mind for the trip.
body: Please if you are not ready to send your personal information,you can forget about the whole stuff I am not here for letter writing.Thank you

subject: Re: No fee needed from you, Kindly  prepare your mind for the trip.
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm always open to hearing new information and learning from others. What would you like to share with me?

Best wishes,
Gerald
